entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Record synthesized implementation of PrintMembers calls object overload for string #78339

PullRequests

Created

  • *** WIP: Reduce allocations in AbstractTypeImportCompletion code paths around realizing ImmutableArrays #78340
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • For IsAtDotDotToken, ensure the current token is a DotToken before parsing the next token to see if it's also a DotToken. #78338
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • *** WIP: Optimize work done in ProjectCodeModelFactory #78337
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Do not offer 'remove unnecessary parens' when it would change a collection initializer #78336
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Allow Razor logs to be directed to the right output window in VS Code #78334
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode

Updated

  • *** WIP: Batch update ProjectUpdateState's RemovedMetadataReferences and AddedMetadataReferences members #78342
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Do not use nint / nuint in IL baselines #78246
    Area-Compilers
  • Add support for FieldRva to EnC delta #78033
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode, Feature - String Literals in Data Section as UTF8
  • Move remaining legacy workspace event listeners over to new APIs. #78333
    VSCode
